column4: I just bought an NVIDIA GeForce 6200 AGP card and the driver in the Ubuntu 8.04 hardware drivers manager freezes my PC so I was wondering what I can do to get me card working properly?
Could someone please acknowledge that my messages are seen here?
thanks
Thank you very much its my first time here.
I was hoping to get some help with my new video card.
Will are you new to Linux?
Will if you need any help I would be more than happy to try with what I know from my Ubuntu use.
Will does private messaging wirk with IRC chat? Im new to IRC and Im using Pidgin in ubuntu.Might be easier to see each others messages easier.
Will did you tell the installer to use all of the hard drive?
Anyone here with NVIDIA driver experience?
I'm pretty good with them
Guy what is the problem?
Is there an easy way to install the *****.run NVIDIA driver without all the command line stuff?
The driver listed X.org new driver freezes my system.
Guy if you enable the multiverse repositories (System->Administration->Software Sources) you should be able to install EnvyNG through add/remove
Guy this provides an easy way to install the NVidia 173.* driver
Yes I tried Envy but it doesnt finish.Gives an error.
Guy you don't get the error from running it on the command line?
Error from running what NVIDIA driver or Envy?
Guy nvidia driver
is it possible to private message you for one on one help?
